trans-unit.source: Associates activities together in a correlation by representing a particular shared <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey"></xref> or transient context in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 将活动关联在一起相关通过表示的特定共享<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey"></xref>或工作流中的暂时上下文。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wf](~/add/includes/wf-md.md)] provides four types of correlation: [Content Based](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Request-Reply](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Durable Duplex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Context Exchange](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wf](~/add/includes/wf-md.md)]提供四种类型的相关︰[内容基于](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[请求-答复](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[持久双工](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[上下文交换](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] correlation, see [Correlation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), the specific correlation types mentioned previously, and the correlation samples located in the [Services [WF Samples]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) node of the [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/add/includes/wf1-md.md)] samples.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]关联，请参阅[相关概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)、 的特定相关性类型前面提到，和的相关性示例位于[服务 [WF 示例]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)节点[!INCLUDE[wf1](~/add/includes/wf1-md.md)]示例。

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: 运行时使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>关联不存在，否则如果**CorrelatesWith**将使用消息传递活动的属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果二者都不存在，由提供的环境句柄<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>或使用工作流服务。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> class.
Registers the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> with the workflow runtime.
Unregisters the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> with the workflow runtime.
